# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ZeusMP_database)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(ZeusMP)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ZeusMPPluginInfo.C
ZeusMPCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
ZeusMPPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ZeusMPMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtZeusMPFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ZeusMPEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtZeusMPFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF4_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

if(WIN32)
    add_compile_definitions(${HDF4_WIN32_DEFINES})
endif()

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF4_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IZeusMPDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IZeusMPDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IZeusMPDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MZeusMPDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MZeusMPDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF4_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MZeusMPDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MZeusMPDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EZeusMPDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EZeusMPDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF4_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EZeusMPDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EZeusMPDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EZeusMPDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EZeusMPDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF4_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EZeusMPDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EZeusMPDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases ZeusMP ${INSTALLTARGETS})
